title: Helvetica (the Movie) in Toronto
content:
[http://designthinkers.com/parties.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108192001/http:/designthinkers.com/parties.html "http://designthinkers.com/parties.html")

Screening – Oct. 16  
Doors Open: 6:00 PM  
Screening: 7:00 PM  
Director Q + A: 8:30 PM

Any T.O. Typophiles going?
author: russellm

comments.content:
I'm thinking about it. It is a 3 hour drive, but there is a show going on around it.

Don

I think it's kind of a pre-event event for R.G.D.'s "Design Thinkers" conference.  
 [http://www.designthinkers.com/index\_2007.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108192001/http:/www.designthinkers.com/index_2007.html "http://www.designthinkers.com/index\_2007.html")

Lots going on on the 17th & 18th.

R
Secret special guest at the post-film Q&A: Stefan Sagmeister.

thanks I'm looking forward to it.  
R
